#labels Featured
Instructions about how to compile it yourself

= Requirements =
 * Embarcadero Delphi 2010 or later
 * Mp3FileUtils - Download it here: http://www.gausi.de/mp3fileutils.html
 * You need Inno Setup to build a setup yourself - See http://www.jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php

= How to I get the source? =
Use a subversion client to pull it out of google code

Contact me if you have any problems by sending an email.
